org.jclouds.cloudstack
Interface CloudStackApi

All Superinterfaces:
Closeable
All Known Subinterfaces:
CloudStackDomainApi, CloudStackGlobalApi
public interface CloudStackApi
extends Closeable

Provides synchronous access to CloudStack.

Author:
Adrian Cole
See Also:
